title: Software Engineering Intern
desc: Join our engineering team to build scalable web applications using modern technologies. Work with React, Node.js, and cloud platforms to deliver features that impact millions of users.

title: Data Science Intern
desc: Work on machine learning models and data analysis for our product recommendations. Experience with Python, pandas, and scikit-learn preferred.

title: Full Stack Developer Intern
desc: Build features for our SaaS platform using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Great opportunity to work with a fast-growing startup and learn modern web development.

title: Product Management Intern
desc: Support product managers in defining requirements, conducting user research, and analyzing metrics. Strong analytical and communication skills required.

title: DevOps Engineering Intern
desc: Learn infrastructure automation, containerization with Docker/Kubernetes, and cloud deployment on AWS. Experience with Linux and scripting languages helpful.

title: Frontend Developer Intern
desc: Create beautiful user interfaces using React, TypeScript, and modern CSS. Work closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect designs and ensure great user experiences.

title: Backend Developer Intern
desc: Develop RESTful APIs and microservices using Python/Flask or Node.js. Experience with databases, caching, and API design patterns preferred.

title: Machine Learning Intern
desc: Research and implement machine learning algorithms for computer vision and NLP applications. Strong background in mathematics and programming required.
